title: Compiler panicked while running cargo check
body:
I ran cargo check on this code https://github.com/xd009642/tarpaulin/tree/5d70da979092e305be12024b60c7fb6c590cee6b 

I hadn't put rustc_serialize in my cargo file so I would have expected cargo check to report an error like cargo build. However, it panicked.

## Meta

rustc 1.16.0 (30cf806ef 2017-03-10)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: 30cf806ef8881c41821fbd43e5cf3699c5290c16
commit-date: 2017-03-10
host: x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu
release: 1.16.0
LLVM version: 3.9

Backtrace:
```
thread 'rustc' panicked at 'called `Option::unwrap()` on a `None` value', /buildslave/rust-buildbot/slave/stable-dist-rustc-linux/build/src/libcore/option.rs:323

                        at /buildslave/rust-buildbot/slave/stable-dist-rustc-linux/build/src/libstd/sys/unix/backtrace/tracing/gcc_s.rs:42

                        at /buildslave/rust-buildbot/slave/stable-dist-rustc-linux/build/src/libstd/panicking.rs:517

                        at /buildslave/rust-buildbot/slave/stable-dist-rustc-linux/build/src/libstd/panicking.rs:501
```
